long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Fabulate Influencer Analytics Chrome Extension
Overview
The Fabulate Influencer Analytics Chrome extension streamlines your influencer marketing journey by integrating your Fabulate account with TikTok, Instagram, and YouTube. Effortlessly analyze influencer metrics and add them to your campaigns directly while browsing.

Installation
Installing the Fabulate Influencer Analytics Chrome extension is as simple as installing any other Chrome extension.

Login
Create a trial account or sign in with your existing Fabulate account to get started.

Functionality
Fabulate, an industry-leading Influencer Marketing Platform, helps you identify top creators, analyze their audience demographics, and collaborate on marketing campaigns. With this extension, you can:

Automatic Detection: The extension automatically detects if Fabulate analytics are available for the profile or page you're viewing.
Detailed Analytics: Pull up detailed analytics for review with just a click.
Prospect Lists: Tag profiles of interest into Prospect Lists for future campaigns.
Support
For any questions or concerns, contact us through your Fabulate account.

Experience seamless influencer marketing with the Fabulate Influencer Analytics Chrome extension.
